name: KLONOA 2: Dream Champ Tournament
description: On a quiet and sunny day, a lone piece of paper falls from the sky and into Klonoa’s hands. Upon closer inspection, it’s a special invite to the famous Dream Champ Tournament! It calls for all adventurers to prove their worth as the greatest hero of them all. Klonoa isn’t really sure what’s going on, but he’s immediately transported into the game arena! It’s already packed with other contestants, and there is a sense of anticipation and mystery in the air. There might be more to this tournament than meets the eye... Guide Klonoa through five worlds, completing each world by eliminating a fellow contestant and collecting magical items. Use the Wind Bullet to draw in enemies, using them either as a jumping boost or a projectile against other foes. The competition is fierce, but Klonoa is determined to win the title of number one!
